description: Try our easy to follow Baked Rice Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 tsp vanilla bean paste or vanilla extract and stir to combine. Divide the pudding between four bowls and top each with 5 blackberries. Serve immediately. You can store it in an airtight container in the fridge for 4-5 days, although it will become very thick.
